# Welcome To My World
Diksha Sivaprasad is a 2025 Master of Science in Business Analytics student at the Paul Merage School of Business. She holds a bachelor's degree in business management and marketing and has gained hands-on experience as both a marketer and analyst across the Proptech, E-Commerce, and Information Services sectors in Dubai. 
 
Driven by a strong interest in data, she has consistently gravitated toward understanding product development and user behavior, now honing her skills in machine learning, data visualization, and strategic decision-making. Beyond academics, Diksha loves spending time at the beach, exploring new restaurants, and saying yes to new experiences.
